text: Megha Akash (born 26 October 1995) is an Indian movie actress who appears in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi language movies. She made her debut in Telugu movie Lie in 2017. == Early life == Megha was born on 26 October 1995 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. She attended the Lady Andal School, Chennai. == Career == Megha started her career by performing in the movie Oru Pakka Kathai, but it got delayed and released on ZEE5 on 25 December 2020. She later starred in the 2017 Telugu, movie and made her Tamil debut in the movie Enai Noki Paayum Thota opposite Dhanush, but Petta released first. ==Filmography== Key Denotes movies that have not yet been released Year Title Role Language Notes 2017 Lie Chaitra Telugu Telugu debut 2018 Chal Mohan Ranga Megha 2019 Petta Anu Tamil Tamil debut Vantha Rajavathaan Varuven Maya Boomerang Gigi Satellite Shankar Pramila Hindi Hindi debut Enai Noki Paayum Thota Lekha Tamil 2020 Oru Pakka Kathai Meera ZEE5 movie 2021 Kutty Story Tamil Manu Charitra Telugu Filming Yaadhum Oore Yaavarum Kelir Tamil Filming Radhe Hindi Filming Gurthunda Seethakalam Telugu Filming ===Music videos=== Year Title Co-actor Ref(s) 2020 Oru Chance Kudu Shanthanu Bhagyaraj, Kalaiyarasan == Awards and nominations == Year Award Category Movie Result 2018 SIIMA Awards Best Debut Actress Lie 2019 Edison Awards Reigning Princess of Kollywood 2020 Edison Awards Best Debut Actress Vantha Rajavathaan Varuven JFW Movie Awards Best Debut Actress Enai Noki Paayum Thota == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Actors from Chennai Category:Malayali people Category:Indian movie actors
